Verses: 1 pinbu, Karththar Mamreyin Samaboomiyile Avanukku Dharisanamaanaar. Avan Pagalin Ushnavelaiyil Koodaaravaasalile Utkaarndhirundhu,

2 than Kangalai Ereduththup Paarkkumbodhu, Idho, Moondru Purushar Avanukku Edhire Nindraargal; Avargalaik Kandavudane, Avan Koodaaravaasalilirundhu Avargalukku Edhirkondu Odith Tharai Mattum Kunindhu;
3 aandavare, Ummudaiya Kangalil Enakkuk Kirubai Kidaiththadhaanaal, Neer Umadhu Adiyenaivittuk Kadandhu Pogavendaam.
4 konjam Thanneer Konduvarattum, Ungal Kaalgalaik Kazhuvi, Maraththadiyil Saaindhukondirungal.

5 neengal Ungal Irudhayangalai Dhidappaduththak Konjam Appam Konduvarugiren; Appuram Neengal Ungal Vazhiye Pogalaam; Idharkaagave Adiyen Idamvaraikkum Vandheergal Endraan. Adharku Avargal: Nee Sonnapadi Sey Endraargal.
6 appozhudhu Aabiragaam Theeviramaaik Koodaaraththil Saaraalidaththirkup Poi: Nee Seekkiramaai Moondrupadi Melliya Maavu Eduththup Pisaindhu, Appam Sudu Endraan.
7 aabiragaam Maattumandhaikku Odi, Oru Nalla Ilankandraip Pidiththu, Velaikkaaran Kaiyile Koduththaan; Avan Adhai Seekkiraththil Samaiththaan.
8 aabiragaam Venneyaiyum Paalaiyum Samaippiththa Kandraiyum Eduththu Vandhu, Avargal Munbaaga Vaiththu, Avargal Aruge Maraththadiyil Nindru Kondirundhaan; Avargal Pusiththaargal.
9 avargal Avanai Nokki: Un Manaivi Saaraal Enge Endraargal? Adho Koodaaraththil Irukkiraal Endraan.

10 appozhudhu Avar: Oru Urpavakaalaththittaththil Nichchayamaai Unnidaththirkuth Thirumba Varuven; Appozhudhu Un Manaiviyaagiya Saaraalukku Oru Kumaaran Iruppaan Endraar. Saaraal Avarukkup Pinpuramaaik Koodaaravaasalil Idhaik Kettukkondirundhaal.
11 aabiragaamum Saaraalum Vayadhusendru Mudhirndhavargalaayirundhaargal; Sthreegalukkulla Vazhipaadu Saaraalukku Nindrupoyitru.
12 aagaiyaal, Saaraal Than Ullaththile Nagaiththu: Naan Kizhaviyum, En Aandavan Mudhirndha Vayadhullavarumaanapinbu, Enakku Inbam Undaayirukkumo Endraal.
13 appozhudhu Karththar Aabiragaamai Nokki: Saaraal Nagaiththu, Naan Kizhaviyaayirukkap Pillaiperuvadhu Meyyo Endru Solvaanen?
14 karththaraal Aagaadha Kaariyam Undo? Urpavakaalaththittaththil Unnidaththirkuth Thirumba Varuven; Appozhudhu Saaraalukku Oru Kumaaran Iruppaan Endraar.
15 saaraal Bayandhu, Naan Nagaikkavillai Endru Maruththaal. Adharku Avar: Illai, Nee Nagaiththaai Endraar.
16 pinbu Andhap Purushar Ezhundhu Avvidamvittu, Sodhomai Nokkip Ponaargal; Aabiragaamum Avargalode Koodappoi Vazhivittanuppinaan.
17 appozhudhu Karththar: Aabiragaam Periya Balaththa Jaadhiyaavadhinaalum, Avanukkul Boomiyilulla Sagala Jaadhigalum Aaseervadhikkappaduvadhinaalum,
18 naan Seyyappogiradhai Aabiragaamukku Maraippeno?

19 karththar Aabiragaamukku Sonnadhai Niraivetrumpadiyaai Avan Than Pillaigalukkum, Thanakkup Pinvarum Than Veettaarukkum: Neengal Needhiyaiyum Nyaayaththaiyum Seydhu, Karththarudaiya Vazhiyaik Kaaththu Nadavungal Endru Kattalaiyiduvaan Enbadhai Arindhirukkiren Endraar.
20 pinbu Karththar Sodhom Komoraavin Kookkural Peridhaayiruppadhinaalum, Avaigalin Paavam Migavum Kodidhaayiruppadhinaalum,
21 naan Irangippoi, Ennidaththil Vandhu Ettina Adhin Kookkuralinpadiye Avargal Seydhirukkiraargalo Illaiyo Endru Paarththu Ariven Endraar.
22 appozhudhu Andhap Purushar Avvidamvittu Sodhomai Nokkip Ponaargal; Aabiragaamo Pinnum Karththarukku Munbaaga Nindrukondirundhaan.
23 appozhudhu Aabiragaam Sameebamaai Serndhu: Dhunmaarkkanode Needhimaanaiyum Azhippeero?
24 pattanaththukkulle Oruvelai Aimbadhu Needhimaangal Iruppaargal, Adharkul Irukkum Andha Aimbadhu Needhimaangalnimiththam Ratchiyaamal Andha Sthalaththai Azhippeero?

25 dhunmaarkkanode Needhimaanaiyum Sangarippadhu Umakku Dhooramaayiruppadhaaga; Needhimaanaiyum Dhunmaarkkanaiyum Samamaai Nadappippadhu Umakku Dhooramaayiruppadhaaga; Sarvaloga Nyaayaadhipadhi Needhiseyyaadhiruppaaro Endraan.
26 adharkuk Karththar: Naan Sodhomil Aimbadhu Needhimaangalaik Kandaal, Avargal Nimiththam Andha Sthalamuzhudhaiyum Ratchippen Endraar.
27 appozhudhu Aabiragaam Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Idho, Thoolum Saambalumaayirukkira Adiyen Aandavarode Pesaththunindhen.

28 oruvelai Aimbadhu Needhimaangalukku Aindhuper Kuraindhiruppaargal; Andha Aindhupernimiththam Pattanamuzhudhaiyum Azhippeero Endraan. Adharku Avar: Naan Naarpaththaindhu Needhimaangalai Ange Kandaal, Adhai Azhippadhillai Endraar.
29 avan Pinnum Avarode Pesi: Naarpadhu Needhimaangal Ange Kaanappattaalo Endraan. Adharku Avar: Naarpadhu Needhimaangalnimiththam Adhai Azhippadhillai Endraar.

30 appozhudhu Avan: Naan Innum Pesugiren, Aandavarukkuk Kobam Varaamaliruppadhaaga; Muppadhu Needhimaangal Ange Kaanappattaalo Endraan. Adharku Avar: Naan Muppadhu Needhimaangalai Ange Kandaal, Adhai Azhippadhillai Endraar.
31 appozhudhu Avan: Idho, Aandavarode Pesaththunindhen; Irubadhu Needhimaangal Ange Kaanappattaalo Endraan. Adharku Avar: Irubadhu Needhimaangalnimiththam Adhai Azhippadhillai Endraar.

32 appozhudhu Avan: Aandavarukkuk Kobam Varaadhiruppadhaaga; Naan Innum Indha Oruvisaimaaththiram Pesugiren; Paththu Needhimaangal Ange Kaanappattaalo Endraan. Adharku Avar: Paththu Needhimaangalnimiththam Adhai Azhippadhillai Endraar.
33 karththar Aabiragaamode Pesimudindhapinbu Poivittaar; Aabiragaamum Thannudaiya Idaththukkuth Thirumbinaan.
